trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Tahlequah
There were no other sightings in Tahlequah on or around June 2nd 2003
Summary: fishing at night became a small but true fish stor
divs: Sighting Detailsme and a buddy we was fishing monday night in a pond outside of tahlequahokla,when my buddy noticed a small fire about 200yrds behind us we thought someone was charcoaling but the fire got biggerwe kept looking when my buddy noticedsomthing above the fire about 2or 300 feet above,it was a bright light so wewere looking at the fire and the light then the light started moving upwardsreal slow it went up about 30 or 40 feet and paused then it slowly started tomove twoard our directionthats when inoticed different colored lights theystarted turning in a circle then the bright white light in the center went outand it moved in our path at about 25 to 30 miles an hr heading east till itdisapeared afew minutes later i saw a bright white light falling fast at armslength it was about 10 ft long we fished for another 30 min didnt see anythingelse
